title: Handwritten Text Recognition: A Survey
authors: Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Antonio Rios-Vila, Jorge Calvo-Zaragoza
description: A comprehensive survey on Handwritten Text Recognition, covering recent advances, challenges, and future directions in the field.

title: On the Generalization of Handwritten Text Recognition Models
description: Study on the generalization capabilities of Handwritten Text Recognition models, analyzing their performance across different domains and datasets.

title: Spatial context-based self-supervised learning for handwritten text recognition
authors: Carlos Penarrubia, Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Jose J. Valero-Mas, Jorge Calvo-Zaragoza
description: Novel approach using spatial context-based self-supervised learning techniques for improving handwritten text recognition performance.

title: Efficient Notation Assembly in Optical Music Recognition
authors: Carlos Peñarrubia, Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Jose J. Valero-Mas, Jorge Calvo-Zaragoza
description: Research on efficient methods for assembling musical notation in Optical Music Recognition systems.

title: Evaluating Domain Generalization in Kitchen Utensils Classification
authors: Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Miguel Alfaro-Contreras, Jorge Calvo-Zaragoza
description: Study on domain generalization techniques applied to kitchen utensils classification tasks.
venue: Iberian Conference on Pattern Recognition and Image Analysis 2023 (108-118)

title: Region-based layout analysis of music score images
authors: Francisco J. Castellanos, Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Antonio Ríos-Vila, Jorge Calvo-Zaragoza
description: Novel approach for analyzing the layout of music score images using region-based techniques.

title: A holistic approach for image-to-graph: application to optical music recognition
authors: Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Antonio Rios-Vila, Jorge Calvo-Zaragoza
description: Comprehensive approach for converting music score images to graph representations in Optical Music Recognition.
venue: International Journal on Document Analysis and Recognition (IJDAR) 25(4) (2022)

title: Efficient Approaches for Notation Assembly in Optical Music Recognition
authors: Carlos Penarrubia, Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Jose J. Valero-Mas, Jorge Calvo-Zaragoza
description: Research on efficient methods for assembling musical notation in Optical Music Recognition systems.
venue: 4th International Workshop on Reading Music Systems (2022)

title: End-to-End Graph Prediction for Optical Music Recognition
authors: Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Antonio Rios-Vila, Jorge Calvo-Zaragoza
description: End-to-end approach for graph prediction in Optical Music Recognition systems.
venue: 4th International Workshop on Reading Music Systems (2022)

title: Continual learning for document image binarization
authors: Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Antonio Sánchez-Hernández, Francisco J. Castellanos
description: Study on applying continual learning techniques to document image binarization tasks.

title: Retrieval of music-notation primitives via image-to-sequence approaches
authors: Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Antonio Ríos-Vila, Jorge Calvo-Zaragoza
description: Research on retrieving music notation primitives using image-to-sequence approaches.
venue: Iberian Conference on Pattern Recognition and Image Analysis 2022 (482-492)

title: Domain Adaptation for Document Image Binarization via Domain Classification
authors: Carlos Garrido-Munoz, Antonio Sánchez Hernández, Francisco J. Castellanos
description: Study on domain adaptation techniques for document image binarization using domain classification.
